title: The verdict upon the dissenters plea, occasioned by their Melius inquirendum to which is added A letter from Geneva, to the Assembly of Divines, printed by His late Majesties special command, with some notes upon the margent under his own royal and sacred hand : also a postscript touching the union of Protestants.
author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.
notes: The copy of this work found on reel 1154:22 is bound with: Pierce, T. Two letters containing a further justification of the Church of England against the dissenters (Wing P2207).
Reproduction of originals in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
